name: Briza, Inc.
description: Developer of an insurance platform designed to offer instant quoting, binding, and issuance of commercial insurance policies. The company's platform acts as a marketplace for automated underwriting models to deliver commercial insurance to small business clients, enabling insurers to bring their products to the world in digital form quickly and cheaply.
